title: Mezzaluna
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Operating in Turin since 1994, Mezzaluna is a vegan restaurant, cafe, and health food shop. The deli features a variety of vegetable dishes and pastries. The shop provides many organic products, including bread, pasta, sweets, grains, pulses, vegetable proteins, fair trade products, personal care, and household cleaning products.
